trans-unit.source: Provides information about a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control that you can display in a catalog of Web Parts controls without having to create an instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的詳細資訊，毋需建立控制項的執行個體，就能顯示在 Web 組件控制項的目錄中。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls are displayed in a catalog of controls that users can add to a page, some basic information about each control is required.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項顯示目錄中的控制項，使用者可以加入頁面中，每個控制項的一些基本資訊。

trans-unit.source: For example, it is useful to have a title for the control, and a description, so that as users view a catalog they have enough information to decide whether to add a control to the page.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，最好有標題控制項和描述，使得它們使用者在檢視類別目錄具有足夠的資訊來決定是否要將控制項加入至頁面。

trans-unit.source: However, a catalog of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls can potentially contain many controls, and it could affect the performance of an application if an instance of every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control must be created to extract the information to display in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: 不過，類別目錄的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項可能包含許多控制項，以及如果執行個體，它可能會影響應用程式效能的每個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項必須擷取要顯示在目錄中的資訊來建立。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> class exists so that it is not necessary to create an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to retrieve the information about the control that is displayed in a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>類別存在，因此不需要建立的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>擷取控制項的目錄中顯示控制項的相關資訊的控制項。

trans-unit.source: In the Web Parts control set, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object is also used in conjunction with the various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls when a page is in catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 控制項 Web 組件中的 集合，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件也會搭配各種<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控制項類別目錄 頁面時顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> class has two overloads of its constructor, one that takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control as a parameter when an instance is available (the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%2A> constructor), and one that takes several strings with information about the control as parameters (the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%2A> constructor).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>類別具有其建構函式，一個會採用兩個多載<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>做為參數執行個體時可用的控制項 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%2A>建構函式)，並使用數個字串做為控制項的相關資訊參數 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%2A>建構函式)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> class also has several properties designed to contain the description information for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>類別也有數個設計成包含的描述資訊的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> properties, and what property each one corresponds to in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 下表摘要說明<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>屬性，以及每一個屬性對應至在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Description property
trans-unit.target: Description 屬性

trans-unit.source: Related part control property
trans-unit.target: 相關組件的控制項屬性

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>類別。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, this type is used primarily by the Web Parts control set, but this code example is simply showing basic programmatic usage of the main description properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，主要是由 Web 組件控制項集合，使用這個型別，但這個程式碼範例只顯示基本程式設計主要描述屬性使用方式。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含四個部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A Web page to host the other controls.
trans-unit.target: 裝載其他控制項的網頁。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the code example works.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的運作方式的說明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is the user control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: The source code for the user control comes from another topic.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項的原始程式碼來自另一個主題。

trans-unit.source: For more details about the user control, see the topic [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用者控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱本主題[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第二個部分是自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses the approach of dynamic compilation.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯的方法。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第三個部分是 Web 網頁。

trans-unit.source: Near the top are two `Register` directives: one that registers the user control, and the other to register the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control whose source file is located in the App_Code folder of your site.
trans-unit.target: 最上方是兩個`Register`指示詞： 一個註冊的使用者控制項，並註冊自訂其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>其來源檔案位於您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The page contains an `<asp:catalogzone>` element, which in turn contains declarative references to two controls: the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control named `TextDisplayWebPart`, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> Web server control that will be treated as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control at run time because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control will wrap it with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object.
trans-unit.target: 此頁面包含`<asp:catalogzone>`項目，其中包含兩個控制項的宣告式參考： 自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，名為`TextDisplayWebPart`，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>Web 伺服器控制項，將會被視為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項在執行時間，因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項將會包裝與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>物件。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the code for the `Button1_Click` method, the available <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the catalog are retrieved using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A> method, and then the description details are all written out to the page.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在程式碼`Button1_Click`方法，可用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>目錄中的控制項可使用擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A>方法，然後描述詳細資料在所有寫出至頁面。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to change the page to catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，然後選取**目錄**變更至目錄顯示模式的頁面。

trans-unit.source: In the catalog, you should see the two controls that are available to be added to the page.
trans-unit.target: 在目錄中，您應該會看到兩個控制項，可用於加入至頁面。

trans-unit.source: Click the **List WebPartDescription Information** button, and the code writes out the values of all available <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects to the page.
trans-unit.target: 按一下**清單 WebPartDescription 資訊**按鈕，並將所有可用的值的程式碼寫入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>至頁面的物件。

trans-unit.source: This demonstrates that you can retrieve description details for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a catalog without having to create instances of the controls themselves.
trans-unit.target: 這將示範您可以擷取說明的詳細資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>而不需要建立控制項本身的執行個體的目錄中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class that contains information about a specific <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 初始化包含特定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項資訊的新類別執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The overloads for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%2A> constructor each return a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> class, which contains information about a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 多載<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%2A>每個傳回的新執行個體的建構函式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>類別，其中包含有關特定資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The difference between the overloads is the scenario in which the new instance is created.
trans-unit.target: 多載之間的差異是在其中建立新的執行個體的案例。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, when the application has an available instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，當應用程式具有的可用執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%2A>建構函式使用。

trans-unit.source: When the application does not have a control instance, as is the case when a control description file is being imported through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式沒有控制項執行個體，在此情況下時控制描述檔案透過匯入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%2A>建構函式使用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control whose information is contained in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項，其資訊包含在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> 之中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control instance is available.
trans-unit.target: 有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項執行個體可用時初始化新的類別執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used for creating a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object based on an existing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%2A>建構函式用來建立新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件會根據現有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This constructor simply calls the other overload, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> constructor, obtaining the required parameter values from properties on the `part` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式只會呼叫其他多載，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>建構函式，取得必要的參數值從屬性上`part`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> property of <paramref name="part" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="part" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.ID" />.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.ID" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Title" />.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Title" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Description" />.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Description" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.CatalogIconImageUrl" />.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.CatalogIconImageUrl" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class by using several strings that contain description information for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項描述資訊的數個字串初始化類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> class when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is not available.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.%23ctor%2A>建構函式用來建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>類別時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>沒有控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, this occurs in the case of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> control when it imports a description file for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，發生這種情況是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>控制當匯入的描述檔案<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: It gets the information it needs to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object directly from the description file, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> instance is not present.
trans-unit.target: 它會取得所需建立資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>description 檔案中，直接從物件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>執行個體不存在。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="id" /> or <paramref name="title" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> 或 <paramref name="title" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets a URL containing the path to an image used as an icon for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 URL，其中包含至用做 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項圖示影像的路徑。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a URL; the default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 包含 URL 的字串；預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property corresponds directly to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>屬性直接對應至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If that property is set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, then the property in the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object will also have a value.
trans-unit.target: 如果該屬性上設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，然後在對應屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件也會有值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is being displayed in a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>屬性適用於僅當頁面處於目錄顯示模式，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>目錄中的控制項顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the control has an icon assigned to it in the property value, the icon appears in the catalog next to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項的屬性值中指定給它的圖示，圖示會顯示在控制項旁邊目錄中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 執行這個程式碼範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>類別概觀主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects in a catalog using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A> method, and then to display the details of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in the catalog by looping through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼中`Button1_Click`網頁的方法將示範如何取得之集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件在目錄中使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A>方法，然後顯示每個詳細資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別目錄的迴圈中的控制項透過<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property value is retrieved in the following code.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>擷取屬性值，下列程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text of a description for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的描述文字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the description for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control; the default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項描述的字串；預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Description%2A> property corresponds directly to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Description%2A>屬性直接對應至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If that property is set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, then the property in the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object will also have a value.
trans-unit.target: 如果該屬性上設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，然後在對應屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件也會有值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Description%2A> property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is being displayed in a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Description%2A>屬性適用於僅當頁面處於目錄顯示模式，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>目錄中的控制項顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the control has a description assigned to it, the description appears in the catalog as a ToolTip on the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項已指派給它的描述，描述會出現在類別目錄做為工具提示控制項上。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Description%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 執行這個程式碼範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>類別概觀主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects in a catalog using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A> method, and then to display the details of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in the catalog by looping through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼中`Button1_Click`網頁的方法將示範如何取得之集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件在目錄中使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A>方法，然後顯示每個詳細資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別目錄的迴圈中的控制項透過<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Description%2A> property value is retrieved in the following code.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Description%2A>擷取屬性值，下列程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of a corresponding <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得相對應 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的 ID。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含控制項的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.ID%2A> property cannot be `null`; it must always have a value.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.ID%2A>屬性不可以是`null`; 它必須一直有一個值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.ID%2A> property corresponds directly to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.ID%2A>屬性直接對應至<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.ID%2A> property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is being displayed in a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.ID%2A>屬性適用於僅當頁面處於目錄顯示模式，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>目錄中的控制項顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.ID%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 執行這個程式碼範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>類別概觀主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code in the `Button1_Click` method of a Web page demonstrates how to get the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects in a catalog using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A> method, and then to display the details of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in the catalog by looping through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼中`Button1_Click`網頁的方法將示範如何取得之集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件在目錄中使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A>方法，然後顯示每個詳細資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別目錄的迴圈中的控制項透過<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>物件。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.ID%2A> property value is retrieved in the following code.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.ID%2A>擷取屬性值，下列程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the title text of a corresponding <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得相對應 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的標題文字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the title of the corresponding control.
trans-unit.target: 包含對應控制項標題的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會提供已計算字串做為預設值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Title%2A> property corresponds directly to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Title%2A>屬性直接對應至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Whatever the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A> property, that becomes the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Title%2A> property; otherwise, the title is a calculated value.
trans-unit.target: 任何對應<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.DisplayTitle%2A>屬性，就會變得的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Title%2A>屬性; 否則標題是計算的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Title%2A> property applies only when a page is in catalog display mode, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is being displayed in a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Title%2A>屬性適用於僅當頁面處於目錄顯示模式，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>目錄中的控制項顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: Whatever title is assigned to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control appears next to the control in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: 指派給任何標題<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項出現在類別目錄在控制項旁邊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.Title%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run this code example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 執行這個程式碼範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>類別概觀主題。
